name: AKIROGA
tag_list: qa, questions, answers, question-and-answers, question, answer
overview:
Akiroga.com is an international Q&A site available in 8 languages: English, Spanish, Chinese, Arabic, Italian, Portuguese, French and German.

Akiroga was launched in summer 2011 and attracted rapidly thousands of users around the world. Today Akiroga has already thousands of questions and answers available in many different categories and in 8 languages.

The categories available on Akiroga are ranked in 28 master categories of which: Business & Finance, Food & Cooking and Wine, Entertainment & Arts, Cultures, Law & Legal Issues, Education, Parenting & Family, Jobs & Careers, Environment, High Tech, History & Politics and Society, Hobbies & Collectibles, Computing and IT, Internet, Games & Recreation, Home & Garden, Fashion and Style, News, Relationships, Religion & Spirituality, Health & Fitness, Science, Shopping, Social, Sports, Animal Life, Cars & Vehicles, Travel and Places.

The website monitors closely the quality of questions and answers posted to be amongts the highest quality websites for Q&A.
